name: Ori and the Will of the Wisps

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file downloaded from GOG

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ori and The Blind Forest - Definitive Edition

task.description: Installing Ori and the Will of the Wisp
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ori and The Blind Forest - Definitive Edition
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Ori and the Will of the Wisp
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
